metadata.title: CVE-2017-18169 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: User process can perform the kernel DOS in ashmem when doing cachemaintenance operation in all Android releases(Android for MSM, Firefox OSfor MSM, QRD Android) from CAF using the Linux kernel.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
